response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This exceptional item holds immense value to both us and you, amounting to $1,200,000. Considering its unparalleled quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. I kindly propose to sell this product to you for $1,150,000. This represents a significant saving of $50,000 compared to its full value, making it an attractive opportunity for you. I trust this offer aligns well with your expectations and budget. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of serving you with this remarkable product.", "product_price": 1150000}
